name: skys-infinite-spidertrons
title: SkyKiwi's Infinite Spidertrons
author: SkyKiwi
description:
Adds customizable number of additional Spidertron tiers.
Tiers have customizeably increasing health, inventory space, grid size, resistances, and size.

Credit to tocko73 for the original ModuleOverhaul which was used as a reference.  Infinity icon from Stockio on Flaticon.com
